tasks.label: Load Extension in Browser
tasks.command: echo 'To test your Media Detector extension:'; echo '1. Open Chrome/Edge and go to chrome://extensions/ (or edge://extensions/)'; echo '2. Enable Developer mode (toggle in top right)'; echo '3. Click "Load unpacked" and select this folder: c:\Users\HP\Desktop\WebExtension'; echo '4. The extension should appear in your browser'; echo '5. Visit any website with images/videos and click the extension icon'; echo '6. Click "Start Detection" to highlight media elements with green boxes'; echo ''; echo 'Extension files updated successfully!'
